data.description: Focus on the theory and practice of video editing and post-production. Gain a thorough understanding of narrative editing techniques, color correction, audio post-production and the requisite software. Discusses the art of post-production and how post-production affects narrative function in moving picture media (including films, music videos, and television).
data.title: EDITING AND POST-PRODUCTION FOR VIDEO AND FILM

data.description: Teaches the skills needed to produce, engage with, and understand new and emerging technologies within the context of communication and creative expression. Become a more critical consumer and producer of digital media.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO DIGITAL MEDIA PRODUCTION

data.description: Theory and practice of media production and screenwriting.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO MEDIA PRODUCTION
